Description:
Required Skills to be successful:1.- Motorcycle sales experience.2.- Customer management experience.3.- Timely resolution. 4.- Proficient in Microsoft Office.About the Team:Reporting to the National Manager Motorcycles and Marine and will work closely with the Sales team and internal and external stakeholders.What equips you for the role:Bachelor’s Degree or Diploma.

Valid UAE motorcycle license.
